cluster_name.description: The name of the EKS cluster.

node_group_name.description: The name of the node group.

node_role_arn.description: The ARN of the IAM role to associate with the node group.

subnet_ids.description: A list of subnet IDs to launch the worker nodes in.

scaling_config.type: list(object({ desired_size : number, max_size : number, min_size : number }))

ami_type.description: The AMI type for the worker nodes. Defaults to AL2_x86_64.

capacity_type.description: The capacity type for the worker nodes. Defaults to ON_DEMAND.

disk_size.description: The root device disk size (in GiB) for the worker nodes. Defaults to 20.

force_update_version.description: Force version update if existing pods are unable to be drained due to a pod disruption budget issue.

instance_types.description: A list of instance types that can be used for the worker nodes. Defaults to ["t3.medium"].

labels.description: The Kubernetes labels to be applied to the nodes in the node group when they are created.

launch_template.type: list(object({ id : string, version : string, name : string }))
launch_template.description: The launch template to use for the node group.

release_version.description: The AMI version of the EKS optimized AMI to use for the worker nodes.

taint.type: list(object({ key : string, value : string, effect : string }))
taint.description: The Kubernetes taints to be applied to the nodes in the node group when they are created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
